properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the announcement in the database.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The text of the announcement.
When the announcement will start.
properties.name: starts_at

properties.description: When the announcement will end.
properties.name: ends_at

properties.description: Whether the announcement is currently active.
properties.name: published
all_day
properties.description: Whether the announcement should start and end on dates only instead of datetimes. Will be false if there is no `starts_at` or `ends_at` time.

properties.name: published_at
properties.description: When the announcement was published.

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: When the announcement was last updated.
Whether the announcement has been read by the current user.
properties.name: read
mentions
properties.description: Accounts mentioned in the announcement text.
Statuses linked in the announcement text.
properties.name: statuses
tags
properties.description: Tags linked in the announcement text.
Custom emoji used in the announcement text.
properties.name: emojis
reactions
properties.description: Emoji reactions attached to the announcement.

Announcement.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.
Announcement.name: Announcement
Announcement.exampleJson:
{ "all_day" : false, "content" : "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "emojis" : [], "ends_at" : null, "id" : "8", "mentions" : [], "published_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "reactions" : [ { "count" : 9, "me" : false, "name" : "bongoCat", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : false, "name" : "thonking", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : false, "name" : "AAAAAA", "static_url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png", "url" : "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png" }, { "count" : 1, "me" : true, "name" : "ðŸ¤”" } ], "read" : true, "starts_at" : null, "statuses" : [], "tags" : [], "updated_at" : "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z" }

Filter.description: Represents a user-defined filter for determining which statuses should not be shown to the user.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the Filter in the database.

properties.name: title
properties.description: A title given by the user to name the filter.
The contexts in which the filter should be applied.
properties.name: context
expires_at
properties.description: When the filter should no longer be applied.
The action to be taken when a status matches this filter.
properties.name: filter_action

properties.description: The keywords grouped under this filter.
properties.name: keywords

properties.description: The statuses grouped under this filter.
properties.name: statuses

Filter.name: Filter

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.
The timestamp for when the status will be posted.
properties.name: scheduled_at
params
properties.description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.

properties.name: params[text]
properties.description: Text to be used as status content.

properties.name: params[poll]
properties.description: Poll to be attached to the status.
The poll options to be used.
properties.name: params[poll][options[]]

properties.description: How many seconds the poll should last before closing.
properties.name: params[poll][expires_in]
params[poll][multiple]
properties.description: Whether the poll allows multiple choices.

properties.name: params[poll][hide_totals]
properties.description: Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.

properties.name: params[media_ids]
properties.description: IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.
Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.
properties.name: params[sensitive]
params[spoiler_text]
properties.description: The text of the content warning or summary for the status.
The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.
properties.name: params[visibility]
params[in_reply_to_id]
properties.description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.

properties.name: params[language]
properties.description: The language that will be used for the status.
ID of the Application that posted the status.
properties.name: params[application_id]
params[scheduled_at]
properties.description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.
Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.
properties.name: params[idempotency]
params[with_rate_limit]
properties.description: Whether the status should be rate limited <!-- TODO: What does this mean -->.

properties.name: media_attachments
properties.description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.

ScheduledStatus.description: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.

   "id" : "1",

      "language" : null,
      "media_ids" : null,
      "poll" : null,
      "scheduled_at" : null,
      "sensitive" : null,
      "spoiler_text" : null,
      "text" : "test post",
      "visibility" : null,
      "with_rate_limit" : false
   },
   "scheduled_at" : "2022-09-29T00:00:00.000Z"
}

Admin::Report.description: Admin-level information about a filed report.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the report in the database.

properties.name: action_taken
properties.description: Whether an action was taken to resolve this report.

properties.name: action_taken_at
properties.description: When an action was taken, if this report is currently resolved.

properties.name: category
properties.description: The category under which the report is classified.
An optional reason for reporting.
properties.name: comment

properties.description: Whether a report was forwarded to a remote instance.
properties.name: forwarded

properties.description: The time the report was filed.
properties.name: created_at
updated_at
properties.description: The time of last action on this report.
The account which filed the report.
properties.name: account

properties.description: The account being reported.
properties.name: target_account

properties.description: The account of the moderator assigned to this report.
properties.name: assigned_account
action_taken_by_account
properties.description: The account of the moderator who handled the report.
Statuses attached to the report, for context.
properties.name: statuses
rules
properties.description: Rules attached to the report, for context.

properties.description: The ID of the FilterStatus in the database.
properties.name: id
status_id
properties.description: The ID of the Status that will be filtered.

FilterStatus.description: Represents a status ID that, if matched, should cause the filter action to be taken.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The value of the hashtag after the # sign.

properties.name: url
properties.description: A link to the hashtag on the instance.

properties.description: The account id.
properties.name: id
username
properties.description: The username of the account, not including domain.
The Webfinger account URI. Equal to `username` for local users, or `username@domain` for remote users.
properties.name: acct
url
properties.description: The location of the user's profile page.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: The profile's display name.
The profile's bio or description.
properties.name: note

properties.description: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.
properties.name: avatar
avatar_static
properties.description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to `avatar` if its value is a static image; different if `avatar` is an animated GIF.
An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.
properties.name: header

properties.description: A static version of the header. Equal to `header` if its value is a static image; different if `header` is an animated GIF.
properties.name: header_static
locked
properties.description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.
Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs.
properties.name: fields
emojis
properties.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.

properties.name: bot
properties.description: Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.
Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.
properties.name: group
discoverable
properties.description: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.

properties.name: noindex
properties.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.
Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.
properties.name: moved
suspended
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

properties.name: limited
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: When the account was created.
When the most recent status was posted.
properties.name: last_status_at
statuses_count
properties.description: How many statuses are attached to this account.

properties.name: followers_count
properties.description: The reported followers of this profile.
The reported follows of this profile.
properties.name: following_count

properties.description: The units associated with this data item's value, if applicable.

total

A human-readable formatted value for this data item.

previous_total
properties.description: The numeric total associated with the requested measure, in the previous period. Previous period is calculated by subtracting the start_at and end_at dates, then offsetting both start and end dates backwards by the length of the time period.
The data available for the requested measure, split into daily buckets.

properties.description: Midnight on the requested day in the time period.

data[][value]
properties.description: The numeric value for the requested measure.

properties.description: The ID of the Web Push subscription in the database.

properties.description: Where push alerts will be sent to.
properties.name: endpoint
server_key
properties.description: The streaming server's VAPID key.

properties.name: alerts
properties.description: Which alerts should be delivered to the `endpoint`.
Receive a push notification when someone else has mentioned you in a status?
properties.name: alerts[mention]
alerts[status]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a subscribed account posts a status?
Receive a push notification when a status you created has been boosted by someone else?
properties.name: alerts[reblog]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when someone has followed you?
properties.name: alerts[follow]
alerts[follow_request]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when someone has requested to followed you?

properties.name: alerts[favourite]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a status you created has been favourited by someone else?
Receive a push notification when a poll you voted in or created has ended?
properties.name: alerts[poll]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a status you interacted with has been edited?
properties.name: alerts[update]
alerts[admin.sign_up]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new user has signed up?

properties.name: alerts[admin.report]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new report has been filed?

Status.description: Represents a status posted by an account.

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the status in the database.

properties.name: uri
properties.description: URI of the status used for federation.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The date when this status was created.

properties.name: account
properties.description: The account that authored this status.
HTML-encoded status content.
properties.name: content

properties.description: Visibility of this status.
properties.name: visibility
sensitive
properties.description: Is this status marked as sensitive content?

properties.name: spoiler_text
properties.description: Subject or summary line, below which status content is collapsed until expanded.
Media that is attached to this status.
properties.name: media_attachments
application
properties.description: The application used to post this status.

properties.name: application[name]
properties.description: The name of the application that posted this status.

properties.name: application[website]
properties.description: The website associated with the application that posted this status.
Mentions of users within the status content.
properties.name: mentions
tags
properties.description: Hashtags used within the status content.
Custom emoji to be used when rendering status content.
properties.name: emojis
reblogs_count
properties.description: How many boosts this status has received.
How many favourites this status has received.
properties.name: favourites_count
replies_count
properties.description: How many replies this status has received.
A link to the status's HTML representation.
properties.name: url
in_reply_to_id
properties.description: ID of the status being replied to.

properties.name: in_reply_to_account_id
properties.description: ID of the account that authored the status being replied to.
The status being reblogged.
properties.name: reblog

properties.description: The poll attached to the status.
properties.name: poll
card
properties.description: Preview card for links included within status content.
Primary language of this status.
properties.name: language

properties.description: Plain-text source of a status. Returned instead of `content` when status is deleted, so the user may redraft from the source text without the client having to reverse-engineer the original text from the HTML content.
properties.name: text

properties.description: Timestamp of when the status was last edited.
properties.name: edited_at
favourited
properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you favourited this status?

properties.name: reblogged
properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you boosted this status?
If the current token has an authorized user: Have you muted notifications for this status's conversation?
properties.name: muted
bookmarked
properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you bookmarked this status?
If the current token has an authorized user: Have you pinned this status? Only appears if the status is pinnable.
properties.name: pinned
filtered
properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: The filter and keywords that matched this status.

Token.name: Token
Token.description: Represents an OAuth token used for authenticating with the API and performing actions.

properties.description: An OAuth token to be used for authorization.
properties.name: access_token

properties.description: The OAuth token type. Mastodon uses `Bearer` tokens.

properties.description: The OAuth scopes granted by this token, space-separated.
properties.name: scope

properties.description: When the token was generated.

properties.description: The ID of the EncryptedMessage in the database.

properties.name: account_id

properties.description: The ID of the Device that sent this message.
properties.name: device_id

properties.description: Whether the message is a pre-key message (used to establish a new session) or a normally encrypted message (part of an existing session).
properties.name: type
body
properties.description: The encrypted message content.

properties.name: digest
properties.description: An HMAC SHA-256 digest hash of the message.
A signed value to be used when reporting the message body for its content.
properties.name: message_franking
created_at
properties.description: A timestamp for when the message was created.

V1::Filter.name: V1::Filter
V1::Filter.description: Represents a user-defined filter for determining which statuses should not be shown to the user. Contains a single keyword or phrase.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the filter in the database.
The text to be filtered.
properties.name: phrase
context
properties.description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.
When the filter should no longer be applied.
properties.name: expires_at
irreversible
properties.description: Should matching entities in home and notifications be dropped by the server? See [implementation guidelines for filters]({{< relref "api/guidelines#filters" >}}).

properties.name: whole_word
properties.description: Should the filter consider word boundaries? See [implementation guidelines for filters]({{< relref "api/guidelines#filters" >}}).

Announcement::Account.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.

ExtendedDescription.name: ExtendedDescription
ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "content" : "

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
MÃ¼hlenstraÃŸe 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (GeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
GefÃ¼hrt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

", "updated_at" : "2022-11-03T04:09:07Z" }
